page.title: 13HIGHAM FERRERS LIBRARY
page.content:
The Library is a very quiet place to choose and to read a book. The Library is quite an old building with a new extension and modern equipment.
During a weekday the Library is visited by old age pensioners who enjoy the peaceful setting as they sit and read the newspapers. Sometimes very young children come in with their mums to choose their first reading books. As school children leave their lessons for the day many head to the Library to get information for their homework. Saturday is the busiest day for the Library as the whole family choose their books.
Most children enjoy Science Fiction books. Enid Blyton and Ronald Dahl are the most popular authors in Higham Ferrers.
